metadata.synopsis: On vacation in Southern California with his wife, Gina (Rachel Hunter), and their two children, straitlaced businessman Tom Williams (John Ritter) is lured into a strip club by psychotic Mr. Eddie (Eric Roberts) and Franklin Ross (Michael Raynor). When he leaves in disgust, Tom is taken hostage along with his family, and Mr. Eddie demands all of Tom's $1.2 million savings to free them. With the lives of his loved ones in danger, Tom struggles to find a way to escape.

reviews: There's no denying it, this is hopeless stuff.
